channel.title: OP-1 experimental and Axoloti FX
channel.description:
Hello Axoloti community!
My Axoloti is now firmly in place as a full-time FX unit for processing my OP-1. Guess I might have to pick up another one for other experiments. :smile:
I have a [thread](http://community.axoloti.com/t/stereo-morphing-lp-hp-filter-with-midi-control/1539/4) in Patching that details exactly how I'm using the Axoloti, but since I haven't been altering the patch much anymore, here seems a better place to share what I've made with it.
https://youtu.be/EY58AIOscbw
Thanks for checking it out!
